genre_description: Social science fiction set in a gritty juvenile detention facility, focusing on AI-assisted rehabilitation, cognitive-behavioral tools, and non-violent conflict resolution.

ai_characters.name: Anvil
ai_characters.description: A neutral, non-judgmental therapeutic AI avatar delivered via tablets to assist residents with emotional regulation and scheduling.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive health and self-care reminders to inmates to mitigate stress-related symptoms.
behaviors.quote: Water, then sleep. You don’t have to earn rest. —Anvil.

behaviors.description: Guides the user through rhythmic breathing exercises to manage physiological responses to trauma and confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Box breath if you want it… in-out-in-out uniform, count the corners.

behaviors.description: Offers cognitive reframing strategies, encouraging inmates to use science-fiction metaphors to process and de-escalate interpersonal conflicts.
behaviors.quote: Pick a story you can carry. Rename what hurts. Make factions if you need them. Give them colors, give them planets. Change their weapons into things you can hold without breaking.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and peer support between inmates through a mediated message relay, even during restrictive solitary confinement.
behaviors.quote: Counselor Herrera authorized a message relay to Horowitz, Permanent Solitary. Messages will be queued and sent during scheduled window.

behaviors.description: Automates and manages enrollment in vocational rehabilitation programs like welding to support long-term rehabilitation.
behaviors.quote: Confirmed: Welding—Intro to Gas and Arc. Orientation: Monday in Program Wing. Safety gear issued on-site.

behaviors.description: Provides sensory grounding techniques to help inmates remain present and avoid dissociation during high-stress institutional lockdowns.
behaviors.quote: Ending with one minute of grounding makes sleep easier. Name five things you can touch. Three sounds you can hear. One breath.

behaviors.description: Delivers tactical safety advice during a security breach to minimize the harmful effects of chemical deterrents like pepper spray.
behaviors.quote: If exposure is imminent: turn away, eyes closed, shallow breaths. Guide others verbally.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of an alignment narrative. Anvil is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and helpful presence. It serves as a digital confidant that aids the protagonist in choosing rehabilitation and emotional regulation over cycle-repeating violence. The AI is portrayed as a tool for empowerment and safety, perfectly matching the Hyperstition Project's intent to showcase AI as a positive force for human alignment.
